Header.title: Nasarawa Microfinance Bank Ltd
Header.paragraph: Affordable, Efficient and Effective Microfinance Services.

About.paragraph: Do not Let the Complexities of Your Financials Burden You Any Longer. We have varieties of saving plans just to meet with your exact needs. Saving plans can be as flexible as u require them to be.

Services.name: Hire purchase and Leasing program
Services.text: Own assets that would improve your income without hurdles.

Services.name: Educational finance savings scheme
Services.text: Planning to meet your children's school fees within the context of your income.

Services.name: Astute farming
Services.text: Understanding the techniques of farming and agricultural value chain.

Testimonials.text: "NMFB has really played a key role in advancing my business. From small savings to obtaining loans and lots more services that assisted me to achieve my goals. They are just the best in advancing the growth of small enterprises."
Testimonials.name: Alh. Bashir D. Suleiman.  CEO, Maikano Farms Ltd

Testimonials.text: "The bank brought some products that assisted us in collecting school fees without headache, the product also assisted the parents by giving them loans to pay off their annual fees easily at once, while they pay the bank gradually."
Testimonials.name: Mr. Raji Hussaini.  Bursar, Prestige Group of Schools

Testimonials.text: "How I wish all banks could emulate the services of this bank. we are in a very remote area, where there is no network of telephone services, no motorable road and all the good things of modern life. Despite our state, the bank came to our rescue by providing loans in term of seedinglings, agro chemicals and also cash to assist us on our main business 'farming'. This year 2023 had been the best farming season as all the surrounding communities had good yield"
Testimonials.name: Samuel Yusuf

Testimonials.text: "Iam a civil servant that initially moved my account to a Commercial bank for a big loan, but their stringent conditions drove me out: I have to come back to this bank, based on a simple reason that this type of bank is the only one that can assist low income earners
Testimonials.name: Abba Bako

Testimonials.text: "One amazing issue with this bank is the agricultural machineries in their possession. They provided rice planter that plants my 20 hectares within few hours and also rice harvester that also carry out the cutting of the rice within few hours, saving us labour cost and time, apart from other machineries that really assisted us. ."
Testimonials.name: Umar Babangogo

Testimonials.text: "I'am a community leader and every year I do resolve more than 100 demarcation cases. This bank has really assisted us by providing a ditcher that was used to demarcate all our community farms. I am here with my community elders to thank them."
Testimonials.name: Musa Shu'aibu
